alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:25AM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Southern Herkimer Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact both the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After widespread light snow falls during the day today, a band of lake effect snow is expected to develop Lake Ontario and reach Herkimer County tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
